text: Avalpoondurai is a panchayat town in Erode district in the state of Tamil Nadu, India. == Demographics == India census, Avalpoondurai had a population of 11,230. Males constitute 52% of the population and females 48%. Avalpoondurai has an average literacy rate of 63%, higher than the national average of 59.5%; with 60% of the males and 40% of females literate. 8% of the population is under 6 years of age. Sri Angala Amman Temple is family deity for Kongu Vellala Gounders - Kadai Kulam pupils spread all over Kongu Nadu region. == Schools == * Government Higher Secondary School Avalpoondurai. == References == Category:Cities and towns in Erode district
title: Avalpoondurai
